鈒字的基本解释

鈒
sà

鈒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sà］
［《廣韻》蘇合切，入合，心。］
［《廣韻》色立切，入緝，生。］
“钑1”的繁体字。
(1)短矛。
(2)戟。
(3)一种农具。
(4)用金银等在器物上嵌饰图案和文字。
(5)指用金银等嵌饰的器物。
(6)插。
[②]［xì］
“钑2”的繁体字。

鈒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鈒； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1298第20
【唐韻】蘇合切【集韻】悉合切，?音趿。【說文】鋋也。【陸雲·答車安茂書】舉鈒成雲，下鈒成雨。　又【廣韻】鈒鏤。【六書故】細鏃金銀爲文曰鈒鏤。又【國史補】四姓，滎陽鄭、岡頭盧、澤底李、土門崔，皆爲鼎甲。大原王亦四姓之匹，時號鈒鏤王家，喩銀質金飾也。　又【廣韻】色立切【集韻】【正韻】色入切，?音歰。【廣韻】戟也，鋋也。　又【集韻】或作鎩。又作闟。【史記·商君傳】持矛而操闟戟者，旁車而趨。【註】闟，亦作鈒。所及反。　又【集韻】迄及切，音吸。義同。　又息入切，音靸。小鋒。

鈒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鈒字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
germanium
sà
germanium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sà］
["Guangyun" Su He cut, enters he, heart. ]
["Guangyun" is a sharp cut, seized, and born. ]
"钑1" in traditional characters.
(1) Short spear.
(2) Halberd.
(3) A farm tool.
(4) Use gold and silver to embed patterns and characters on the utensils.
(5) Refers to utensils inlaid with gold and silver.
(6) Insert.
[②]［xì］
"钑2" in traditional characters.
germanium
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鈒; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1298 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Su Heqie [Ji Yun] Hexie,? Sound. [Said the text] Yun Ye. [Lu Yun·Answers to Che Anmao's book] The cloud will become a cloud, and the rain will become a rain.　[Guangyun] 鈒luo. [Six Books and Gu] The fine gold and silver are called 鈒lou. Also [Guo History Supplement] The four surnames, Xingyang Zheng, Gangtoulu, Zedi Li, and Tumen Cui, are all Dingjia. The king of Ohara is also the horse of the four surnames, the time name is carved out of the king's house, and also silver and gold ornaments.　[Guangyun] Se Liqie [Jiyun] [Zheng Rhyme] Sekiness,? Sound. [Guang Yun] The halberd is also the stubborn.　[Jiyun] or stunned. And for Yun. [Historical Records·The Legend of Shang Jun] Those who wield a spear and wield a halberd will move next to the car. 【Note】闟, also used as 鈒. Reversed.　[Jiyun] So far, sound absorption. The same meaning.　Into the cut again, sound. Xiaofeng.
